message_text: Congratulations! You won a prize! Click http://bit.ly/prize123 to claim NOW or call 0912345678
openai_reason: The message claims the recipient has won a prize and urges immediate action, which is a common tactic in scams. The use of a shortened link and a phone number further indicates potential fraud.
